resources.string: Fred is an Archeologist and Adventurer on search of treasures and artifacts. He indeed on Tut\'s tomb, but needs your help to exit from laberinth. There are dangers that he must evade, like poison dropping from ceiling, phantoms, pink porcupines that he must to jump to don\'t hurt him, chamaleons that go up and down on walls and mummies, vampyres and skeletons that he can kill with a shot of his gun, but with care because only have 6 bullets. On his way, he find treasures, life potions, bullet charges and a map that be a great help to find the pyramid\'s exit, it is always on the top. The ZX Spectrum is a 8 bits personal computer very popular on world\'s homes and specially on spanish homes on 80\'s. It\'s processor be a Zilog Z80 at 3.5 Mhz, 16Kb ROM and 48K or 128K of RAM depending of model. Designed by Richard Altwasser of Sinclair Research.
Fred on colour

EXIT
Well done!! You have unlocked color Fred!!

You defeat the Pharaon Curse, now you can choose the enemies!!
At least you go out!!

NEXT LEVEL
Enter your initials
Gauntlet unlocked!! You have defeated all mummies!!
Awesome!! 50 skeletons converted on bone powder!!
Vampyres erased!! Level unlocked!!
Level 1 - Fred starts his adventure, beware of ghosts, rats and acid drops.
Level 2 - Chamaleons and mummies appears, Ghosts remains (Or they are Chef\'s Hats?)
Level 3 - Beware Fred, the vampyres go for you.
Level 4 - Skeletons, they are crazy for your bones.
Level 5 - Bonus Level, pick all the treasures you can!! But you must go out before time ends.
Level 6 - Tut\'s revenge, 50 mummies against Fred ¿Which one will won?
Level 7 - A bunch of bones, fight against 50 skeletons!!!
Level 8 - Dracula Piramyd, 50 vampyres flying on corridors.
Level 9 - Egypcian Hell, 200 enemies against Fred ¿You will survive?
999 Level - You choose it, then don\'t cry and enjoy!!!
Extra Level - You are a master of Fred!!! Thank you for playing.
To unlock the secret you must to pass level 3
